Healthy food  
1. Freshly cooked, with little oil/
fat, compatible, clean, light, warm and seasonal food should be taken.
2. Meals containing all six tastes namely, sweet, sour, salty, pungent, bitter and astringent 
should be included.
3. Food items recommended in different categories such as 
– cereals, pulses, vegetables, fruits, dry fruits, milk and milk products, beverages, non-
vegetarian foods, condiments 
and spices.
4. Recommended foods 
according to constitution, age, 
work profile and disease.
 
Unhealthy food 
1. Those that contain foreign bodies such as dust particles, grass, bones, hair, 
nails, etc.
2. Preserved, tinned and canned foods.
3. Baked (half baked, over-cooked food) and re-warmed, stale food.
